AddressInfo.Title: Gearings Point Hermanus
AddressInfo.AccessComments: As you enter the Gearings Point Parking Area from Marine Drive, the CP is situated at the "Sculpture on the Cliffs" area, morst Southern point of the Parking Area.

GeneralComments: Whale Coast Solar. With more than 10 years of solar experience and over 30 years of electrical experience, we offer a full turnkey solution that requires no 3rd parties to complete your installation. We are fully insured and registered with all the relevant governing bodies to offer you peace of mind while we work in your home or business. This company offers the electric vehicle driver a stress-free commute in and around Hermanus with a newly installed 30 kw DC and 22 kw AC.
